openGraph.title: About Cozy Bites Kitchen - Easy Comfort Food Recipes
openGraph.description: Welcome to Cozy Bites Kitchen - your home for easy, cozy, and delicious homemade recipes for everyday cooking.

images.alt: Cozy Bites Kitchen - Easy comfort food recipes

hero.title: Welcome to Cozy Bites Kitchen
hero.subtitle: Easy, Cozy & Delicious
hero.description: **Comfort food made simple** - creating **easy homemade recipes** for everyday cooking and real-life moments.

chef.name: Sarah Mitchell
chef.description: I'm Sarah Mitchell, founder of Cozy Bites Kitchen and mom of two. What started as my personal mission to create simple family recipes has grown into a team of five passionate recipe creators. Together, we bring you diverse perspectives, expertise, and flavors for every occasion.
story: Welcome to Cozy Bites Kitchen! I'm Sarah, founder and the home cook who started this journey in 2019 after one too many complicated recipes that didn't fit real family life. But here's the exciting part—what began as my solo project has evolved into something much bigger.

Today, Cozy Bites Kitchen is powered by a diverse team of five recipe creators: me (Sarah Mitchell, family meals expert), Emily Chen (quick meal specialist), Marco Rodriguez (international flavors), Olivia Greene (healthy living advocate), and David Thompson (comfort food master). Each brings unique expertise, cultural perspectives, and cooking styles.

Our philosophy remains simple: good food doesn't have to be complicated. Whether you need a 20-minute weeknight dinner, authentic international flavors, healthy plant-based options, or soul-warming comfort food, our team has you covered. Every recipe is tested in real home kitchens by real people—because that's who we are.

contactInfo.title: Contact information

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how Cozy Bites Kitchen collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Complete privacy policy covering cookies, analytics, advertising, and your data rights under GDPR and CCPA.

openGraph.title: Privacy Policy - Cozy Bites Kitchen
openGraph.description: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and personal information when you visit Cozy Bites Kitchen.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: At Cozy Bites Kitchen, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services to discover easy comfort food recipes and everyday cooking tips.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect the following personal information when you interact with our website:

subsections.title: Personal Information
items: Email address (when you subscribe to our newsletter)
Name (if provided when leaving comments or contacting us)

subsections.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Pages visited and time spent on our website
Search terms used to find our recipes

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and maintain our website and recipe services
Send you our newsletter with new comfort food recipes (with your consent)
Respond to your comments, questions, and recipe requests
Improve our website and develop better recipes
Analyze website usage and cooking trends
Personalize your experience and show relevant content
Prevent fraud and ensure website security

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, want to exercise your privacy rights, or have concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us:

contact.note: For privacy requests, please use email contact above
contact.responseTime: We will respond to your privacy requests within 30 days.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Cozy Bites Kitchen website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: Use of Service
sections.content: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use the site in any way that violates applicable laws or these terms of service.

sections.title: Content and Intellectual Property
sections.content: The content on Cozy Bites Kitchen, including recipes, images, text, graphics, and logos, is protected by intellectual property laws. Personal use is permitted, but commercial use requires written permission.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@cozybiteskitchen.com.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Important disclaimer information about Cozy Bites Kitchen content, recipe accuracy, health considerations, and nutritional information. Please read before using our recipes.

openGraph.title: Disclaimer - Cozy Bites Kitchen
openGraph.description: Important information about using Cozy Bites Kitchen content and recipes safely.

sections.title: General Information
sections.content: The information provided on Cozy Bites Kitchen is for general informational and educational purposes only. While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date recipes and cooking information, we make no warranties or guarantees about the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content on this website.

sections.title: Recipe Usage & Safety
sections.content: All recipes on Cozy Bites Kitchen are provided 'as is' and are intended for informational purposes only. Always follow proper food safety guidelines, check ingredients for allergens, and use your best judgment regarding substitutions.

sections.title: Health & Dietary Considerations
sections.content: Cozy Bites Kitchen content is not intended to provide medical or dietary advice. If you have food allergies, medical conditions requiring dietary restrictions, or special nutritional needs, please consult with a qualified healthcare professional.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us at hello@cozybiteskitchen.com.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Cozy Bites Kitchen website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: Website Usage
sections.content: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use the site in any way that violates applicable laws, restricts others' use, or engages in harmful conduct.

sections.title: Content Usage and Intellectual Property
sections.content: The content on Cozy Bites Kitchen is protected by intellectual property laws. You may use recipes for personal, non-commercial purposes and share recipe links with proper attribution, but may not copy or republish substantial portions without permission.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at hello@cozybiteskitchen.com.
